name: My Time Amongst The Stars
description:
(NOTE: It may take a few seconds to load the game, and rooms in the game.)

(UPDATE: Currently the Voicing hack is not working properly and was removed)

In this game I narrate all my past experiences using the Bitsy game making engine for the 5 Year Bitsy Anniversary game jam.  

I talk about finding Bitsy, joining the Bitsy community, the games I've made, the ideas I've left behind,  and my feelings on Bitsy and being able to create small games.

I did not choose any specific Jam Theme, but, considering the theme could be seen as "all the themes", then, my theme could be seen as "All the Bitsy": all my experience with Bitsy.

Bitsy Hacks used:

  • permanent items (by Sean S. LeBlanc)
  • transparent sprites (by Sean S. LeBlanc)
  • bitsymuse (by David Mowatt)
  • dialog audio vocal synth (by Sean S. LeBlanc )

Hacks applied using Borksy by Ayolland.

References:

  • Bitsy : The game making engine by Adam Ledoux
  • The Bitsy Jim Jam host by Ebeth: This was the game that drew me into Bitsy
  • Secrets Agent by Marina Kittaka: The voiced game that inspired my own game ideas.
